description: First concept identifier in the relationship.
Second concept identifier in the relationship.
The relationship between CONCEPT_ID_1 and CONCEPT_ID_2. Please see the Vocabulary Conventions for more information.
The date when the relationship is first recorded.
comment: Start date for the relationship validity.

description: The date when the relationship is invalidated.
comment: End date for the relationship validity.

description: Reason the relationship was invalidated. Possible values are ‘D’ (deleted), ‘U’ (updated), or NULL.
